metadata.title: TeggiTech — Digital Agency | Dakar, Senegal
metadata.description: We build mobile apps, websites and digital solutions. Based in Dakar, working for Africa and the world.

hero.label: Digital Agency / Dakar
hero.description: We design and build mobile apps, websites and digital platforms. From Dakar to the world, we create for

offers.label: What we do
offers.title: our services
offers.headline: We've got you covered from A to Z
offers.description: From idea to finished product, we handle everything.
offers.approach: We work hand in hand with you. We listen, advise, and build. No unnecessary jargon, just real results.

conseil.title: consulting
conseil.description: We analyze your needs, review what already exists, and recommend the best technical solution. Simple and clear.

strategie.title: strategy
strategie.description: Together we define your project priorities, key milestones, and the best path to results. From first prototype to launch.

delivery.title: delivery
delivery.description: We build your product. Mobile apps for iPhone and Android, websites, online platforms. Full development with quality assurance.

expertises.label: What we're good at
expertises.title: our expertise
expertises.description: Design and development: two complementary teams to create digital products that work.

product.title: Design & Product
product.description: We create beautiful and easy-to-use interfaces. We think about your users at every step so your product feels intuitive and delightful.

engineering.title: Development
engineering.description: We build solid and fast applications. Clean code, great performance, and a product that lasts.

mobile.label: Mobile Apps
mobile.title: mobile
mobile.headline: Your app on iPhone and Android
mobile.description: We build your mobile app for both platforms at once. The result: a fast, smooth app ready for the stores.

feature1.title: Fast and smooth
feature1.description: Your app works just as well as a native app. Smooth animations, fast loading, great experience.

feature2.title: iPhone and Android at once
feature2.description: No need to build twice. We create one app that works everywhere. Cheaper, faster, easier to maintain.

feature3.title: From design to store
feature3.description: We handle everything: design, development, and publishing on the App Store and Google Play. Your app is ready to download.

projects.label: Our work
projects.title: projects
projects.headline: What we've built
projects.description: A few projects we've worked on. Each one is a unique collaboration with our clients.

project1.title: Tiak-Tiak
project1.description: On-demand transport and delivery mobile app. Real-time driver-passenger matching across Senegal.

project2.title: Tiak-Tiak Marketplace
project2.description: E-commerce platform integrated into the Tiak-Tiak ecosystem. Buy, sell and deliver local products in one place.

project3.title: Lardoiz
project3.description: School management platform. Online enrollment, payment tracking, parent-school communication and dashboards for institutions in Senegal.

footer.tagline: Designed in Dakar / Built for the world
